body: This is already translated! Where is it?

*dies*
If I ask for translations, I'll die so uhhhh it has been 1 month I need translation

Hard to imagine that March 2020 was 2 years ago. Memories of these times feel so familiar, so close but I know nothing in the world be able to bring me back there. I miss those times more than anything in the world and everything now is just a reminder that things aren't as good as they used to be. I know one day I'll be able to feel as happy as I did before but it's not hard to lose faith in that. The one thing that haunts me is that I took those times as granted, I felt like the king of the mountain and that I'll never be able to come down. Oh boy, was I wrong. This leaves a good lesson for anyone. Never take anything for granted.
